statements: SELECT * FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE soil_id = 1;
SELECT soil_type, nutrient_level FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE pH_value > 6.5;
SELECT soil_id, soil_type, nutrient_level FROM soil_monitoring_table ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT pH_value, soil_type FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy';
SELECT soil_id, pH_value FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE nutrient_level < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE pH_value > 5.5 ORDER BY pH_value DESC, nutrient_level ASC
SELECT soil_type, AVG(nutrient_level) AS avg_nutrient_level FROM soil_monitoring_table GROUP BY soil_type HAVING AVG(nutrient_level) > 7
SELECT soil_type, pH_value FROM soil_monitoring_table WHERE nutrient_level > 5 ORDER BY pH_value ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT MAX(nutrient_level), MIN(nutrient_level), AVG(nutrient_level) FROM soil_monitoring_table
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM soil_monitoring_table
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels
SELECT location, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE pH_value > 6.5
SELECT id, location, nutrient_level, pH_value FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, crop_name, season FROM CropProduction
SELECT crop_name, optimal_nutrient_level, optimal_pH_value FROM CropProduction WHERE optimal_nutrient_level < 5.0
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT id, location, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_level > 2.5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_nutrient_level, season FROM CropProduction WHERE season = 'Summer' ORDER BY optimal_nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels INNER JOIN CropProduction ON SoilNutrientLevels.nutrient_level = CropProduction.optimal_nutrient_level;
SELECT location, pH_value FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE pH_value < 6.5 OR pH_value > 7.5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 5
SELECT id, sample_date, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE id = 1
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM FieldLocations WHERE id = 3
SELECT name, type FROM Crops WHERE type = 'fruit'
SELECT id, sample_date, ph_value FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT id, ph_value FROM SoilSamples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT name, type FROM Crops WHERE nutrient_requirements LIKE '%nitrogen%' ORDER BY name
SELECT SUM(nitrogen_level) AS total_nitrogen FROM SoilSamples
SELECT * FROM FieldLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels ORDER BY nutrient_name ASC
SELECT id, nutrient_name, nutrient_value FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE nutrient_value > 5
SELECT location, pH_value FROM pH_Values WHERE pH_value BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5 ORDER BY pH_value DESC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop_Production WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sampling_date, technician_name FROM Soil_Sampling WHERE location = 'Field A'
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE nutrient_value > 5 ORDER BY nutrient_name ASC, id DESC
SELECT id, pH_value, location FROM pH_Values WHERE pH_value BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY id
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop_Production WHERE expected_yield < 1000 ORDER BY planting_date DESC, crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Soil_Sampling WHERE sampling_date >= '2022-01-01' AND technician_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY location
SELECT id, location, pH_value FROM pH_Values WHERE location LIKE '%farm%' AND pH_value < 6.5 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_level > 5;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crops WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, area_acres FROM FieldLocations WHERE area_acres < 20;
SELECT crop_id, nutrient_name, required_level FROM CropNutrientRequirements ORDER BY crop_id, nutrient_name;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_level, measurement_date FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crops WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT field_name, location, area_acres FROM FieldLocations WHERE area_acres > 10 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_level, measurement_date FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_level > 2.5;

SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, required_level FROM Crops JOIN CropNutrientRequirements ON Crops.id = CropNutrientRequirements.crop_id WHERE required_level < 5.0 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
